description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Six Day Cycle Race in Berlin; historic monuments at Charlottenburg Castle; "A 18" students theatre; Indian Katakhali dances; training for the Olympic Winter Games, 1968; new light-house in Kiel Bay; the 19th International Book Fair at Frankfurt-am-Main; painting and sculpture of Harst Antes; wine harvest on the Moselle and Rhine; Germany defeats Yugoslavia in European Nations Cup.
